Krisztián Hofstädter

pictures of you

A music release featuring compositions for a theatre play.

time: July 2015

tags: music, theatre, sound-design, video, photography

Inspired by the ‘mental imagery’, emotion and the study and treatment of bipolar disorder, Pictures of You presents the intriguing meeting of two friends after many years apart. Full of unexpected lightness, warmth and love, the play explores the challenge of recalling the past and picturing the future… ~Menagerie

In Menagerie’s What’s Up Doc? series playwrights were paired with academic collaborators. For this play written by Craig Baxter the collaborator was Dr Martina Di Simplicio from the MRC Cognition and Brain Sciences Unit, Cambridge.

 

I did music and sound design, photography, camera operating and video editing.

Photography here.

tools: Logic, Canon HD, Sony Nex5n, Adobe Premier
